channel.title: vpn on cat ~/differing-opinions.txt > /dev/null
channel.description: Recent content in vpn on cat ~/differing-opinions.txt > /dev/null

item.title: Arch VPN
item.description: I have trouble sometimes navigating network connectivity using Arch. The OS doesn’t really have an issue getting out to networks, I just seem to not remember what to do in a time of need. Unfortunately, it is usually the first thing you need to do to begin the problem solving process. It is not lost on me that I am posting this article on the Internet. You’ll find it after you get in to trouble.
